## Overview

Download training materials for the CoPhil EO AI/ML Training Programme. All materials are provided under open licenses for educational use.

## Additional Resources

### Recommended Reading

**Earth Observation:**
- [Copernicus Open Access Hub User Guide](https://scihub.copernicus.eu/userguide/)
- [Sentinel-1 Toolbox Documentation](https://step.esa.int/main/toolboxes/snap/)
- [Sentinel-2 User Handbook](https://sentinel.esa.int/web/sentinel/user-guides/sentinel-2-msi)

**Python for Geospatial:**
- [GeoPandas User Guide](https://geopandas.org/en/stable/getting_started.html)
- [Rasterio Quickstart](https://rasterio.readthedocs.io/en/latest/quickstart.html)
- [Python Geospatial Development](https://www.oreilly.com/library/view/python-geospatial-development/9781800203679/)

**Google Earth Engine:**
- [Earth Engine Python API Guide](https://developers.google.com/earth-engine/guides/python_install)
- [Earth Engine Community Tutorials](https://developers.google.com/earth-engine/tutorials/community/explore)
- [Awesome Earth Engine](https://github.com/giswqs/Awesome-GEE)

**AI/ML for EO:**
- [Deep Learning for Earth Observation (Springer)](https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/978-3-030-82327-6)
- [Fundamentals of Machine Learning for Predictive Data Analytics](https://mitpress.mit.edu/9780262044691/)
- [Data-Centric AI Resource Hub](https://datacentricai.org/)
